means: Environmental Quality Incentives Program 环境质量激励程序

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都含有"提供，供给"之意。
means: equip ： 侧重提供与技术有关的装备或设备等。
furnish ： 多指添置家具等供给生活的必需品或为生活舒适提供所需的服务设施。
supply ： 普通用词，指提供任何所需求的东西。
provide与supply近义，但强调人的深谋远虑，侧重用贮备等方法作充分准备。
afford ： 一般只用于对抽象事物提供，也可指经济能力上的供给或支付。

sentence.Network_en: Owners of restaurants would have to equip them to admit disabled people.
sentence.Network_cn: 餐厅老板将必须在餐厅里配备能够接纳残疾人的设施。

sentence.Network_en: Your education will equip you to earn a good living.
sentence.Network_cn: 你所受的教育会使你过上富裕的生活.

sentence.Network_en: We equip our children with a good education.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们使孩子们受到良好的教育.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French équiper, probably from Old Norse skipa 'to man (a ship'), from skip 'ship'

entry.def: If you equip a person or thing with something, you give them the tools or equipment that are needed.

example.ex: They become obsessed with trying to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency...
example.tran: 他们变得痴迷于给自己的车辆装备小配件，以应付可能出现的各种紧急情况。

example.ex: Owners of restaurants would have to equip them to admit disabled people...
example.tran: 餐厅老板将必须在餐厅里配备能够接纳残疾人的设施。

entry.tran: （尤指通过教育）使做好准备，使有能力，使有资格
entry.def: If something equips you for a particular task or experience, it gives you the skills and attitudes you need for it, especially by educating you in a particular way.

example.ex: Relative poverty, however, did not prevent Martin from equipping himself with an excellent education...
example.tran: 然而，较为贫困的状况并没有阻止马丁让自己接受一流的教育。

example.ex: A basic two-hour first aid course would equip you to deal with any of these incidents.
example.tran: 两小时的基础急救课程能够让你有能力处理这类事件。

means.word_mean: 1. provide with (something) usually for a specific purpose;

sentences.sentence: "The expedition was equipped with proper clothing, food, and other necessities"
"She was never equipped to be a dancer"

auth_sentence.content: He had sought to equip himself with the tools of artistry.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had sought to equip himself with the tools of artistry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had sought to equip himself with the tools of artistry.

auth_sentence.content: The Church needs time to equip itself with better PR skills.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Church needs time to equip itself with better PR skills.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Church needs time to equip itself with better PR skills.

auth_sentence.res_content: Equip every front-line manager to discuss work-life issues and implement policies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Equip every front-line manager to discuss work-life issues and implement policies.

Sentence.sentence: Being equipped with one of the most recent cutting-edge IT products could just help a college or university foster a cutting-edge reputation.
In the author's view, being equipped with IT products may help colleges and universities build an innovative image

sentences.en: They equipped themselves with a pair of sharp axes and set off for the forest.
sentences.cn: 他们带上两把利斧便朝森林走去。

sentences.en: His evening study has equipped him for a career as a teacher.
sentences.cn: 夜校的学习使他能担任教师的工作。

sentences.en: Your education will equip you to earn a good living.
sentences.cn: 你所受的教育会使你过上富裕的生活。

jushi.english: They can't afford to equip their army properly.
jushi.chinese: 他们无力使军队得到应有的装备。

jushi.english: They were plainly ill equipped to deal with the situation.
jushi.chinese: 很明显,他们装备太差,无法应付这种局面。
